entries.Introduction: Have you seen my brother the Twizard?$b#He recently visited me, and after returning to the woods where he resides, I have not heard from him.$e#Maybe that explorer who traverses the woods knows of his whereabouts.
entries.Wed: I'm happy to have my brother as a guest, but since he hasn't been able to return home I have started to lose my patience.$r#All these wizard jokes are simply too much for me.
entries.Fri: $q# 10 Fri_alt#I wonder... Have you spoken with my brother yet?$r# 10 0 Fri_a1#Yes, he can't get into his house because the forest has become completely overgrown.$r# 11 0 Fri_a2#No, I havent found him.
entries.Fri_alt: I wonder what could possibly cause the forest to grow this rampantly!#$rNot only that, but the rapid regrowth truly perplexes me...
entries.Fri_a1: I see... a truly intriguing situation, but now I will have to help my brother with this mess.$r#I won't hear the end of his complaining!
entries.Fri_a2: Hmm... I guess I'll just have to find him myself.
entries.Forest: I believe there is magic at play here. It seems something from within the forest has caused this accelerated regrowth.

entries.Introduction: Ah I see you have cleared the forest of its overgrowth! It seems the heart was creating a magical aura that was accelerating growth. Maybe we could create something of use with it.
